description:
Could it be more comfortable than your bed at home? Made for cottages and family camping, this long, wide mat puts 4 inches of padding between you and a hard world. Separate valves let you inflate or deflate it by tiny amounts to tune it from extra-firm to super-soft. Vertical sidewalls with no rounded edges let you sprawl across every square inch of the surface.

  • Top fabric is honeycomb embossed for velvety softness against your skin
  • Open cell polyurethane foam provides self-inflation
  • Flat valve lets you release small amounts of air to fine-tune firmness
  • Valves sit flat against mat to protect them from damage
  • Rated for use to -48°C
  • Includes mini pump, stuff sack, repair kit, and instruction sheet
name: Exped Megamat 10 LXW Sleeping Pad - Unisex
